Name: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of The Spankster
About the game: In Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster, you play as Conner, a high school student who gains the extraordinary power to pull unlimited pencils out of his pockets. But this power is not just for show - Your mission is to use your skills and wit to take down The Spankster, a fellow student who has acquired the power to spank others without any repercussions. But beware, as the real harm comes from the public humiliation that the victim is subjected to. As you navigate the halls of the high school, you'll encounter a cast of colorful characters and make choices that determine the course of the story. Will you be able to stop The Spankster and restore peace to the school? It's up to you to decide. With four different endings to discover, each based on the choices you make, Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster offers a truly interactive experience. Will you be a hero, a rebel, or something in between? The fate of the school is in your hands.
